data.prayer: Father, please reward those who diligently seek you with a heart of faith in the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar.
data.verse: Without faith it is impossible to be well pleasing to him, for he who comes to God must believe that he exists, and that he is a rewarder of those who seek him.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar, Libya

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar to exponentially multiply disciples.
Father, guide the church in Al Jabal al Akhdar, Libya to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Algerian, Arabic-speaking people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, encourage the 333 believers in Al Jabal al Akhdar to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the disciples in the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar to find a person of peace today, like the Philippian jailer, who heard and was immediately baptized with his whole family.
data.verse: And they spoke the word of the Lord to him and to all who were in his house. And he took them the same hour of the night and washed their wounds; and he was baptized at once, he and all his family.

data.section_summary:
the state of Al Jabal al Akhdar, Libya has a population of 210,000.

We estimate Al Jabal al Akhdar has 333 people who might know Jesus, 4,862 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 204,806 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 630 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the fearful in Al Jabal al Akhdar, Libya to submit to God and resist the devil.
data.verse: Submit yourselves, then, to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
